title: Phase 1: Project scaffolding
description: Create index.html, src/ directory structure, main.js entry point. Verify: just dev serves page without errors.

title: Phase 6: Pan interaction
description: Create input.js with mousedown/mousemove/mouseup handlers. Convert px delta to BigInt time via pxToTime. Smooth 1:1 tracking.

title: Phase 5: Render loop with revision checking
description: Wire up requestAnimationFrame loop in main.js. Only redraw when state.revision changes. No dispatch from render loop.

title: Tracer Bullet: Prove core architecture
description: Minimal end-to-end slice validating Canvas 60FPS, BigInt time, rational scale, pan/zoom. See plans/2026-01-19-tracer-bullet.md

title: Phase 7: Zoom interaction
description: Add wheel event handler with anchor-point zoom. Calculate world time under cursor, apply zoom, compensate viewport. Clamp to bounds.

title: Phase 2: BigInt time coordinates & rational scale
description: Create time.js (constants, project, isVisible) and scale.js (rational numer/denom, pxToTime, timeToPx). Must handle 4.5Ga without precision loss.
close_reason: BigInt time coordinates and rational scale implemented with 39 passing tests

title: Phase 4: Canvas renderer with culling
description: Create renderer.js with DPI scaling, ResizeObserver, draw() with culling, FPS counter. Events as colored rectangles.

title: Phase 3: State management store
description: Create store.js with viewportStart, scale, canvasWidth, revision counter, events array. Derived viewportEnd. dispatch/subscribe pattern. ~60 lines.

title: Phase 8: Deep-time sample data & validation
description: Create samples.js with 100 events: 50 recent (1900-2100), 25 geological (Ma), 25 cosmological (Ga). Add axis labels and grid. Validate 60FPS at all scales.
